name: Adventurers of Skye the Slime Maid (Bus Arrows Studios)
name_original: Adventurers of Skye the Slime Maid (Bus Arrows Studios)
description:
Join the cool and sociable MC's RPG medieval-themed, romance-comedy, fantasy visual novel adventures with his magical, beautiful monster girl, slime maid, to become the best Adventurers in the country.

Genre: Comedy, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

Romance: B x G 

Rating: 13+  (Mild Language, Mild Sexual References and Alcohol References) 

Playtime: 2-3 hours

After departing from his old team, the protagonist of the game: Alex Goldstone, is now a solo Adventurer exploring the land of Bromwich. He currently helps the city of Tipton with its new Guild Centre with other Adventurers that complete quests for the community.

 

After weeks of assisting Tipton, Alex became a respectable Guild member to the townsfolk. He's doing well at his starting point, but everything changes when he encounters a slime.

 

A beautiful and noisy goddess named Larissa, the goddess of life and fertility, saw Alex save the slime from a wolf attack, and he took it home.

 

To reward the lone Adventurer for his rare act of kindness, she transforms the slime into a magical humanoid slime maid to serve her new master.

 

Since it’s Skye’s new dream to be an Adventurer like her master, Alex enrolls her to become a new Guild member for Tipton.

 

Alex and Skye will have many missions, fight choice-based creatures and bosses, and meet new friends along the way. The bond between Alex and Skye will grow into a romance, and we'll learn more about Alex's past in this comedy-romance, drama, fantasy, and fake RPG themed visual novel. Join their quest!

Skye's voice actress is played by Shakyra Dunn. She's best known for Roya in Angelic Waves.

Tara's voice actress is played by Kristen McGuire. She's best known for Ruri in Dr Stone, Cinnamon in The Nekopara Anime, Milim Nava in the popular anime, That Time I Got Reincarnated As A Slime, and more.

Lizabeth's voice actress is played by Blair Greene-Osako. A newcomer in the VA community.

Larissa's voice actress is played by Michelle Lee. She's best known for Sumire in Missing Time, Chloe in Sophistry and more.

Thomas's voice actor is played by Brandon P Jenkins. They best known for Klay in Brok: The Investigator, Jack Jones in Adventures of Jack Jones, and more.

Director/Writer/Programmer/Character Design: Jaygee598

Background (BG) Artists: ReefMeizer, Irsanmiftah, Necromew, Arixaf, Romaji

CG artists: ReefMeizer, Redkinoko

Character Sprites: Necromew

Character Artist: Larcian

GUI: MadScientist

Social Media graphic designer:  PogoNG

Assistant Programmer: just_mr_j

Writing Editor: Kelebek

Music – Teksoda, Potriel, Deal_rodriguez, Souptonic

Thank you so much for playing the game!

All donations goes towards future Bus Arrows Studios' gaming projects.

See you next time!
